title: dAsanAga undan
sahitya:
dAsanAga undan pAdAra vindam nADum Ashai koLLum endanai AtkoLvAi kandanE


anupallavi

  pAsha valaiyil vizhum nAsham viLaivikkum Ashai Edum urAmal aDiyEn kaDaittEra


caraNam    mAsu paDiyAmal enadu manamidilE ini vIsu puhazh unadinaip-pEshum isaip-paN pADi
kAsu paNa mOhamUTTum pisAcu aNugAla ODa shAsvatamAna perum sukha vAsap-pEru kUDa
